attributes.action: Fully sack everyone involved in the failings leading to the death of baby "P" and take away any thought of full pay or even compensation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should anyone that has been highlighted as being part of the reason baby "P" was brutally murdered while on the "radar" get full pay while suspended, or even get compensation.

rejection.details:
Under the remit of the local authority, numerous redundancies have occurred relating to this case.

You may wish to sign the following related petition:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BabyPEnquiry/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
